text:
Hello we have setup a couple of validator with Okta not an expert but here are some things we found:
• Okta generates audiences which equals the client_id for the *Id Token* for the *Access Token* the audience is configured on the Auth server
• The Wallet checks the *aud* claim of the  *Access Token* so just make sure the audience of okta auth server and the audience you configured when setting the validator match
• You can configure the audience of the Auth server in the admin panel of okta
We were able to setup a wallet with the audience set `api://default`  another was using a custom auth server so that should also work, so the URL check must be very lenient
Hope that helps!

api://default

another was using a custom auth server so that should also work, so the URL check must be very lenient
Hope that helps!
